item.title: Installing Docker on Ubuntu 20.10
item.description:
Ubuntu ❤️ Docker

Hello everyone,

Recently I installed the latest non-LTS version of Ubuntu 20.10 Groovy Gorilla and found it a hassle to install Docker using this tutorial, specifically the repository setup step.
